themes: expansion of resources to maximize potential
danger of decadence if energy is overcommitted

classical.hd_quote: The ability when surplus resources are available to extend one's activities beyond their normal scope.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Knows growth begins by not repeating the same experience; branches to new cycles when there is energy.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Scatters sacral energy into too many half-finished experiences → 'decadence'.

classical.hd_quote: Recognition and acute capitalization of trends.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Projects, 'I can grow with this,' and rides collective trends into increase.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Overidentifies with trends it cannot actually resource; stops growth when change hits.

classical.hd_quote: Mistakes are a natural part of the process.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Accepts that growth = messy cycles; keeps moving through experience despite errors.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Broods over mistakes; becomes overly cautious and blocks maturation.

classical.hd_quote: The quintessential manifestation of the mediator.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Mediates resources so others can complete their cycles; knows experience needs company.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Overconcern with harmony distorts mediation and slows growth.

classical.hd_quote: The fulfillment and actualization of purpose as a natural path.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Appears mature → is entrusted with resources → fulfills purpose through growth.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Turns growth inward and reclusive; withholds energy from collective increase.

lines.group_role: model of completed cycles / maturity beacon

classical.hd_quote: The power to share the process of growth with others.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: From the roof, chooses when growth is worth transmitting; shares mature experience.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Refuses to share gains; materialistic protection of energy → aggression from others.

meta.provenance: classical.hd_title and classical.hd_quote are verbatim (<25 words) from Ra Uru Hu’s Line Companion on Archive.org for HEXAGRAM 42 INCREASE, lines 42.1–42.6. Interpretations are original behavioral mappings for S³.
